description.value:
The Creative Student is deep and introspective. They prefer to communicate emotions and tribulations through visuals, the written word, music, or other forms of art. These emotionally mature individuals sometimes feel out of place with others who seem years behind them.

Restriction: Must start the game with at least 11 Intelligence and 11 Charisma

Student Abilities:

  • Characteristic Points: +1 to Intelligence, +1 to Charisma, +1 to Any Other

  • Starting Skills: Mysticism, Purity, Performance OR Coordination

  • Artistic Vision: @UUID[Compendium.mka.studenttypes.b7W1QxQjdHl8LSJP]{Artistic Vision} You may use Inspiration and, as a Free Action, your next Mysticism, Performance, Coordination, or Purity Skill Check result becomes 20+Mod. You may only use this ability during a Non-Combat Encounter and it can used after dice are rolled.
